game.name: The Secret of the Necromancer
game.description: The Secret Of The Necromancer is a game were you have to explore the area and solve puzzles to be able to save your friends! Slip into the role of one of the three friends to explore the area, but watch out and try to avoid dangerous creatures! Solve the puzzles, find the Necromancer and save your friends!
